# Acute IE
```{r acute, results='asis'}
acute_data<-anal_data%>%
  filter(Duration_Onset2Op<=14)

tbl_data<-acute_data
source('R_script/04_Make_Tables.R')
acute_table1<-baseline_tbl
myt_output='HTML'
acute_table1%>%print_mytable()

surv_data<-acute_data
source('R_script/05_Analysis.R')
fig5<-surv_fig1
fig6<-surv_fig2
fig5
fig6
```
